Title: Growing up in the midst of struggle
Notes: The destruction of undesirable thought and publication was taught to one and all during the Cultural Revolution. This poster shows the determination and fanaticism with which children re-enact an event in which somebody is called to account for spreading counterrevolutionary publications, scattered on the floor. Judging by the looks of the two grown-ups, this is clearly no laughing matter. The slogan on the wall reads "Struggle to strengthen the dictatorship of the proletariat!"
Theme: Cultural Revolution Campaigns (1966-1976)To Read Too Many Books is Harmful
